text: “E inu amene mwakhulupirira! Mukayenda pa njira ya Allah, musachite chinthu pokhapokha mutaonetsetsa bwino. Ndipo musanene kwa amene akukulonjerani Salamu (kuti): “Sindiwe wokhulupirira,” (nkumupha). Mukufuna zinthu zamdziko lapansi komatu kwa Allah kuli zopeza zambiri. Umo ndi momwe inunso mudalili kale; koma Allah adakuchitirani chifundo (choncho mudalowa m’Chisilamu. Penyetsetsani bwinobwino). Ndithu Allah Ngodziwa bwinobwino nkhani zonse zimene muchita
